typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{représentant} as string,
		{n° département} as string,
		{département} as string,
		{code point de vente} as string,
		{libellé point de vente} as string,
		{code depot source} as string,
		{code client} as string,
		client as string,
		{n° siret} as string,
		{code postal} as string,
		ville as string,
		{année livraison} as string,
		{mois livraison} as string,
		{code fournisseur} as string,
		{fournisseur principal} as string,
		{code produit} as string,
		produit as string,
		{réference} as string,
		{qte en unité de vente} as string,
		{montant prv net} as string,
		path as string,
		{numéro fournisseur} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ecoulement
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerShortName as string,
		UnitID as string,
		POSid as string,
		POSdescription as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		SupplierID as string,
		BrandID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		SectorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> organisation
source(output(
		year as string,
		reference as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ventesDirectes
select5 compose(mapColumn(
		id = idDecrementation,
		PossAMid = POSSAMidString,
		reference = {Réference},
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		qte_venteDirecte = {Qté ventes directes}
	),
	composition: 'decrementationVenteDirecte') ~> fdecrementation@(output1)
rename derive(yearmonth = regexExtract(fileName , '(\\d+)'),
		qte_ecoulement = toDouble(qte_ecoulement)) ~> yearmonth
yearmonth derive(year = substring(yearmonth, 1, 4),
		month = substring(yearmonth, 5 ,2)) ~> yearAndMonth
yearAndMonth filter(isNull(qte_ecoulement)) ~> quantityNull
aggregate1 filter(!isNull(qte_ecoulement)) ~> quantityNotNull
ecoulement select(mapColumn(
		{Code point de vente} = {code point de vente},
		{Code Depot source} = {code depot source},
		{Code client} = {code client},
		Client = client,
		{Code postal} = {code postal},
		Ville = ville,
		{Mois livraison} = {mois livraison},
		{code fournisseur},
		{fournisseur principal},
		{Code produit} = {code produit},
		produit,
		{Montant prv net} = {montant prv net},
		{Représentant} = {représentant},
		{N° Département} = {n° département},
		{Département} = {département},
		{Libellé point de vente} = {libellé point de vente},
		{N° Siret} = {n° siret},
		{Année livraison} = {année livraison},
		{Réference} = {réference},
		qte_ecoulement = {qte en unité de vente},
		fileName = path
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> rename
quantityNotNull filter(!isNull({Code point de vente})) ~> codePointVenteNotNull
organisation derive(POSid = trim(POSid, " "),
		HubSAPid = trim(HubSAPid, " ")) ~> cleansing
cleansing filter(!isNull(POSid)) ~> posidNotNull
posidNotNull aggregate(groupBy(POSid,
		HubSAPid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		WholeSalerShortName = max(WholeSalerShortName),
		UnitID = max(UnitID),
		POSdescription = max(POSdescription),
		County = max(County),
		POSSAMid = max(POSSAMid),
		POSSAMidString = max(POSSAMidString),
		SupplierID = max(SupplierID),
		BrandID = max(BrandID),
		WholeSalerHubID = max(WholeSalerHubID),
		HubName = max(HubName),
		SectorID = max(SectorID)) ~> uniqueOrganisation
codePointVenteNotNull, uniqueOrganisation join({Code point de vente} == POSid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation
ventesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		year,
		Article = reference,
		{Code client_right} = {Code client},
		{Qté ventes directes} = qte_ecoulement
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameVentesDirectes
innerOrganisation, RenameVentesDirectes join(aggregate1@year == RenameVentesDirectes@year
	&& coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace({Réference}, " ", ""))),replace({Réference}, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Article, " ", ""))),replace(Article, " ", ""))
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client_right},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerVentesDirectes
innerOrganisation, RenameVentesDirectes join(aggregate1@year == RenameVentesDirectes@year
	&& coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace({Réference}, " ", ""))),replace({Réference}, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Article, " ", ""))),replace(Article, " ", ""))
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client_right},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftVentesDirectes
select2 filter(isNull(yearmonth) || isNull(Article) || isNull({Code client_right})) ~> outerleftVentesDirectes
Addcolumn select(mapColumn(
		{Code postal},
		marque_file = {fournisseur principal},
		article = produit,
		ca_ecoulement = {Montant prv net},
		{Représentant},
		departement_id = {N° Département},
		reference = {Réference},
		qte_ecoulement,
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		UnitID,
		County,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_id = BrandID,
		HubSAPid,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniformisation
join1, outerleftVentesDirectes union(byName: true)~> fullLeftUnion
fullLeftUnion derive(canal = '',
		distributeur = "vf_confort") ~> Addcolumn
codePointVenteNotNull, uniqueOrganisation join({Code point de vente} == POSid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftOrganisation
leftOrganisation filter(isNull(POSid)) ~> posidNULL
innerVentesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		{Code point de vente},
		{Code Depot source},
		{Code postal},
		Ville,
		{Montant prv net},
		{Mois livraison},
		{code fournisseur},
		{fournisseur principal},
		{Code produit},
		produit,
		{Représentant},
		{N° Département},
		{Département},
		{Libellé point de vente},
		{Année livraison},
		{Réference},
		qte_ecoulement,
		fileName,
		yearmonth,
		year = aggregate1@year,
		month,
		POSid,
		HubSAPid,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerShortName,
		UnitID,
		POSdescription,
		County,
		POSSAMid,
		POSSAMidString,
		SupplierID,
		BrandID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		SectorID,
		Article,
		{Code client_right},
		{Qté ventes directes}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select1
leftVentesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		{Code point de vente},
		{Code Depot source},
		{Code postal},
		Ville,
		{Mois livraison},
		{Montant prv net},
		{code fournisseur},
		{fournisseur principal},
		{Code produit},
		produit,
		{Représentant},
		{N° Département},
		{Département},
		{Libellé point de vente},
		{Année livraison},
		{Réference},
		qte_ecoulement,
		fileName,
		yearmonth,
		year = aggregate1@year,
		month,
		POSid,
		HubSAPid,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerShortName,
		UnitID,
		POSdescription,
		County,
		POSSAMid,
		POSSAMidString,
		SupplierID,
		BrandID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		SectorID,
		Article,
		{Code client_right},
		{Qté ventes directes}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select2
idDecrementation select(mapColumn(
		{Code point de vente},
		{Code Depot source},
		{Code postal},
		Ville,
		{Montant prv net},
		{Mois livraison},
		{code fournisseur},
		{fournisseur principal},
		{Code produit},
		produit,
		{Représentant},
		{N° Département},
		{Département},
		{Libellé point de vente},
		{Année livraison},
		{Réference},
		qte_ecoulement,
		fileName,
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		POSid,
		HubSAPid,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerShortName,
		UnitID,
		POSdescription,
		County,
		POSSAMid,
		POSSAMidString,
		SupplierID,
		BrandID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		SectorID,
		Article,
		{Code client_right},
		{Qté ventes directes},
		idDecrementation
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select3
yearAndMonth aggregate(groupBy({Code point de vente},
		{Code Depot source},
		{Code postal},
		Ville,
		{Mois livraison},
		{code fournisseur},
		{fournisseur principal},
		{Code produit},
		produit,
		{Représentant},
		{N° Département},
		{Département},
		{Libellé point de vente},
		{Année livraison},
		{Réference},
		fileName,
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month),
	qte_ecoulement = sum(qte_ecoulement),
		{Montant prv net} = sum(toDouble({Montant prv net}))) ~> aggregate1
select1 keyGenerate(output(idDecrementation as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	stepValue: 1L) ~> idDecrementation
idDecrementation select(mapColumn(
		idDecrementation,
		POSSAMidString,
		{Réference},
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		{Qté ventes directes}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select4
select4 derive(month = toInteger(month),
		qte_ecoulement = toFloat(qte_ecoulement),
		{Qté ventes directes} = toFloat({Qté ventes directes})) ~> derivedColumn2
derivedColumn2 select(mapColumn(
		idDecrementation,
		POSSAMidString,
		{Réference},
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		{Qté ventes directes}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select5
fdecrementation@output1 select(mapColumn(
		id,
		qt_final
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endDecrementation
select3, endDecrementation join(idDecrementation == id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> join1
quantityNull sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['VFCONFORT_QTE_NULL.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> outputQuantityNull
uniformisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Région Statistique} as string,
		Enseigne as string,
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Article National DESC} as string,
		{Article National Code} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Agence DESC} as string,
		{Département DESC} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		Secteur as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		{Année Précédente (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice A-1 (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N-1} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul N-1} as string,
		fileName as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['VFCONFORT_ECOUL_PREPARED.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> VFCONFORTECOULPREPARED
posidNULL sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		POSid as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		BrandID as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['VFCONFORT_ORGANISATION_NOTFOUND.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> VFCONFORTORGANISATIONNOTFOUND
